title: Laws of the Insect Hive - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery
tags: Game Elements   Level System   Male Protagonist
author: Our Dagger
description:
He cannot remember his name, but now, he is a little grasshopper named System. Soon, he gets used to his new body and enjoys the life of jumping around in the forest freely... He is amazed that his little body can jump a few meters with a casual leap. One day, when System is having fun in the forest, a leaf falls from its branch. Autumn has come, and System's time is ticking away. 

System needs to lengthen his short lifespan and survive in the Forest of Leyte. Luckily, he finds a way to manipulate an army of ants and now they are at his disposal... to fight bigger prey.>
